subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Line of David went gate-to-wire in the $1 million Arkansas Derby, one week after the trainer John Sadler’s other colt Sidney’s Candy ran off with the Santa Anita Derby.
snippet: Line of David went gate-to-wire in the $1 million Arkansas Derby, one week after the trainer John Sadler’s other colt Sidney’s Candy ran off with the Santa Anita Derby.
